title: My Honour
body:
I've been receiving loads of honors. I'm sure i have more then 50 honors at this point and it still says i'm at level 2 honor. 

Is there any way that could be fixed? Thanks

replies.body: Game honours are the short term reward. Honour levels are meant to be a long term goal. It's going to be comparatively slower this season, because we have the whole season to earn honour instead of just a few months.
